name: Where's my Mom?
description:
Where's my Mom? - Developed by ThePCGamer101 using the RPG Maker VXAce Engine by enterbrain!

Key Features :-<section>
  • Play as Oliver as you venture out to save your mom
  • Battle monsters and creatures of the castle
  • Meet friendly characters on the way
  • Cutscenes to make the game more interesting
  • Updates to polish the game and make it better
  • Best of all, it's FREE!
</section><section>Description :-

You play Oliver, a young teenager who finds out that his mom has been kidnapped by the evil Dark Ghoul, through this RPG Game, created with RPGMaker VXAce and CityMayor Games and the creative developer (creator of The KODU Race Game) ThePCGamer101, join Oliver when you go on an adventure to kill the evil Dark Ghoul

Reviews and Comments :-"It was quite an interesting game" - HeuGamer (ModDB)"Pokemon without pokemons + typical RPG + sweet trophies = good game!" - Adam Christopher Hayes (Gamejolt)"Looks pretty good can't wait to see it greenlit" - ★*~FireMarioBros~*★ (Steam Greenlight Concept)

3.4 on Gamejolt

3.7 stars on IndieCity

4033 of 15764 Popularity on ModDB

3292 of 12297 Popularity on IndieDB

67 Total Downloads on RPGMaker.net

59% Yes on Steam Greenlight Concept

View here for review info - Ratings and comments were correct at the time of producing the "Where's my Mom? - A Big Thank You!" video

System Requirements :-

Minimum Specs:

Windows
  • CPU Cores: Single Core
  • Minimum RAM: 512 MB
  • DirectX Version: 9.0
  • Graphics Card RAM: 512 MB
  • Graphics Card: 7.0
  • Graphics Card Shader Model: Not Required
  • Sound Card: Required
  • CPU Speed: 2.0 GHz
  • Operating System: Windows XP (32/64-bit). Windows Vista (32/64-bit). Windows 7 (32/64-bit).
Extras :- Soundtrack

The official soundtrack to the RPG Maker game Where's my Mom?, developed by ThePCGamer101 and published by CityMayor Games. You can download the OST for free from Bandcamp (www.citymayorgames.bandcamp.com/releases)

Extras :- Support

If you encounter technical problems with the game, you can contact our CMG Support Team by visiting CMG Support (www.citymayorgames.wix.com/cmgsupport)

Extras :- Other Games

If you enjoyed Where's my Mom? Then why not visit CityMayor Games and play the other games developed by ThePCGamer101 and his one-man indie company CityMayor Games (www.citymayorgames.wix.com/home)

Content Rating :-

The developer has provided the following content rating for this item:

FAMILY FRIENDLY: Mild Fantasy Violence, Mild Language
